mapper.select:
SELECT a.hycrSeq , a.hycrDelNy , a.hycrName , b.hycmSeq , b.hymmSeq , c.hymmName
FROM hybdChatRoom a LEFT JOIN hybdChatMember b on b.hycrSeq = a.hycrSeq LEFT JOIN hybdMember c on c.hymmSeq = b.hymmSeq LEFT JOIN hybdSpace d on d.hyspSeq = a.hyspSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND d.hyspSeq = #{hyspSeq} AND b.hymmSeq = #{hymmSeq} AND a.hycrDelNy = 0
group by d.hyspSeq , a.hycrSeq

SELECT a.hymmName , c.hycrName , c.hycrSeq
FROM hybdMember a LEFT JOIN hybdChatMember b on b.hymmSeq = a.hymmSeq LEFT JOIN hybdChatRoom c on c.hycrSeq = b.hycrSeq LEFT JOIN hybdSpace d on d.hyspSeq = c.hyspSeq
WHERE 1=1
AND d.hyspSeq = #{hyspSeq} AND c.hycrSeq = #{hycrSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE hybdChatRoom SET hycrDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND hycrSeq = #{hycrSeq}
